name: Why You? [Episode 1]
description:
Hi there,

this is my entry for the Yuri Game Jam 2022.

Playtime is around 5 Minutes. The loading times for the scenes might be a bit longer.

You play as Kat, who just had a super stressful day at work. And since it can always get worse, she meets the super popular girl from her high school class who happens to be rather interested in getting to know her. The theme of the series will be dealing with comphet and being on the ace spectrum.

This game was inspired by the Manga Still Sick and the Warioware games.

This is only Episode 1 and Episode 2 will be released in December.

You can move by using the WASD/Arrow keys. You can interact with objects by pressing space.

This was made with Fungus for Unity.
